thread.title: Gemma Whelan wins viewers:: 'Moorside isn't just about Sheridan Smith' | Metro News
thread.title_full: Gemma Whelan wins viewers:: 'Moorside isn't just about Sheridan Smith' | Metro News

author: Amy Duncan For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Gemma Whelan wins viewers:: 'Moorside isn't just about Sheridan Smith' | Metro News
text:
Amy Duncan for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 14 Feb 2017 10:14 pm Gemma Whelan portrayed Karen Matthews in The Moorside (Picture: BBC One) 
Gemma Whelan has been described as being ‚Äòon another level‚Äô by TV viewers, who have declared BBC One drama The Moorside shouldn‚Äôt just be ‚Äòabout Sheridan Smith‚Äô. Sponsored 13 realities of going wedding dress shopping 
The gritty two-part drama concluded on Tuesday night and its second-part had viewers insisting that lesser-known Gemma deserves the same recognition as award-winning actress Sheridan Smith. 
REVIEW: The Moorside review: Sheridan Smith‚Äôs new drama is bleak but surprisingly hopeful 
However, it has evidently been Sheridan Smith who has garnered most of the headlines for her BBC One programme, for her portrayal of Karen‚Äôs friend and neighbour Julie Bushby , who lead the search to find Shannon Matthews. To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video Sheridan Smith starred alongside Gemma Whelan in The Moorside (Picture: BBC One) 
And now TV fans have taken to Twitter to ensure Gemma is also given the recognition she deserves for her powerful performance on screen. One point viewers were keen to address is that The Moorside certainly isn‚Äôt ‚Äòjust about Sheridan‚Äô. Gemma Wheelan doesn't get enough credit for #Moorside she's brilliant üëèüèªüëèüèª 
‚Äî Robyn Parry (@robynparry92) February 14, 2017 I really hope Gemma Whelan gets all the awards for #Moorside , dang Sheridan Smith as Julie Bushby in The Moorside (Picture: BBC One) #GemmaWhelan is amazing as #KarenMatthews in #Moorside . It's always all about bloody #sheridansmith ! 
‚Äî Matt Phillips (@Matt_Phillips1) February 14, 2017 Gemma gave a gritty performance as Karen Matthews (Picture: BBC One) In fact, Gemma was simply referred to as ‚Äòthe actress playing Karen‚Äô by some viewers, who had no idea who she was. Sheridan Smith is outstanding in #Moorside but the actress who plays Karen is another level 
‚Äî Dawn Clarke (@Bastetgirl28) February 14, 2017 The woman playing Karen Matthews is absolutely incredible #Moorside
